projects.title: ğŸ”§ LLM-Powered Predictive Maintenance & Fault Detection for Combustion Engines
projects.description:
Imagine a system that listens to every pulse of your engineâ€”whether in a car or an industrial generatorâ€”and warns you of issues before they ever surface. Powered entirely by a large language model (LLM), it can ingest and interpret any stream of dataâ€”from its central "brain" or from every connected sensorâ€”without limitations on volume or type.

Seamlessly integrated with ESP32 and Raspberry Pi devices, it captures real-time readingsâ€”vibrations, temperature fluctuations, oil pressure, or any custom signalâ€”and the LLM transforms raw inputs into actionable insights. No traditional machine-learning pipelines needed: the model's deep contextual understanding deciphers patterns and pinpoints potential failures across the system.

Experience a new era of engine care: truly boundary-less diagnostics, proactive alerts down to the component level, and uninterrupted performance in any industrial or automotive setting.
